item.title: TP2
item.description: Diagramme de Gantt Q1 gantt title Lâ€˜ordonnancement FIFO non preemptif dateFormat s axisFormat %S P1: 0 , 8 P2: 8 , 9 P3: 9 , 11 P4: 11 , 17 P5: 17 , 18 \( \frac {0+8+7+7+11} {5} = 6.6 s\) Q2 gantt title L'ordonnancement par priorite preemptif dateFormat s axisFormat %S P1: 0 , 4 P4: 4 , 10 P5: 10 , 11 P1: 11 , 15 P2: 15 , 16 P3: 16, 18 \( \frac {7+15+14+4}{5} = 8 s\)

item.title: TP1
item.description: Exo1 Q2 cut -d ' ' -f 2 demo.txt Q3 head -n 23 demo.txt | tail -n 9 Q4 cat demo.txt | tr ' ' '\n' Q5 cat demo.txt | tr ' ' '\n' | sort | uniq -c Q6 grep -c "ABC" demo.txt Q7 grep '^[A-Z]' demo.txt Exo2 Q1 grep "Restauration" entreprise.txt > restauration.txt Q2 grep "^94" entreprise.txt Q3 grep "^91" -c entreprise.txt Q4 cut -d ':' -f 2 entreprise.
